comment: No even integer equals an odd integer (i.e. no integer can be both even and odd). Exercise 10(a) of [Apostol] p. 28. This variant of ~ zneo follows immediately from the fact that a contradiction implies anything, see ~ pm2.21i . (Contributed by AV, 22-Jun-2021.)
